Package com.flipfit.dao

Interface FlipfitCustomerDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipfitCustomerDAOImpl
public interface FlipfitCustomerDAO
DAO interface for customer-related database operations in the Flipfit system
Author:
Khushi, Kritika

  • Method Details

    • getCustomerById

      FlipfitCustomer getCustomerById(int customerId)
      Retrieves a customer by their ID
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to retrieve
      Returns:
      FlipfitCustomer object if found, null otherwise
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - If there is an issue with the database operation

    • getCustomerByEmail

      FlipfitCustomer getCustomerByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a customer by their email address
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the customer to retrieve
      Returns:
      FlipfitCustomer object if found, null otherwise
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - If there is an issue with the database operation

    • addCustomer

      boolean addCustomer(FlipfitCustomer customer)
      Adds a new customer to the database
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object to add
      Returns:
      True if added successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - If there is an issue with the database operation

    • updateCustomer

      boolean updateCustomer(FlipfitCustomer customer)
      Updates an existing customer in the database
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object with updated details
      Returns:
      True if updated successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - If there is an issue with the database operation
      UserNotFoundException - If the customer doesn't exist

    • deleteCustomer

      boolean deleteCustomer(int customerId)
      Deletes a customer from the database
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to delete
      Returns:
      True if deleted successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - If there is an issue with the database operation
      UserNotFoundException - If the customer doesn't exist

    • getAllCustomers

      List<FlipfitCustomer> getAllCustomers()
      Retrieves all customers from the database
      Returns:
      List of all customers in the system
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - If there is an issue with the database operation

    • getNextCustomerId

      int getNextCustomerId()
      Returns:
      The next customer ID.
